Posts.Content: cS2016 wrote: I am at high risk for Breast Cancer and I am considering surgery. We live in an area in Kentucky where all the doctors that I have seen so far are more concerned about saving the breast over the person. I am trying to be proactive but the doctors in this area are looking at me like I am crazy. any suggestions? I have had a needle biopsy and now a tissue biopsy both came back fine. 90% reduce risk is great and better than the other treatments. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: getting serious about reducing my risks cS2016 MelissaDallas
